title: Provides for tax exemptions related to the elderly, and the reporting of the effects of certain programs related thereto
summary: Provides a resident personal income tax exemption to individuals caring for elderly dependents over the age of 62 who reside with such individuals and who are entitled to an exemption for federal income tax purposes; requires the office for the aging to report to the governor and the legislature regarding the effects of such tax credit, its use or non-use and the extent to which such credit aids families.
